title: Sidewall, 1920–50
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Two alternating landscape scenes. The first is a loaded apple tree, with a young man climbing a ladder and handing apples down to a woman. A full basket sits under the tree. The other scene contains a small building with a smoking chimney and a dog outside in the yard. Printed in blue and orange on light orange ground.

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1920–50.
1920–50. Block-printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-66.
